pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"概览","depth":2},{"url":"#react-core","depth":2,"text":"React 核心团队 "},{"url":"#andrew-clark","depth":3,"text":"Andrew Clark "},{"url":"#brian-vaughn","depth":3,"text":"Brian Vaughn "},{"url":"#dan-abramov","depth":3,"text":"Dan Abramov "},{"url":"#luna-ruan","depth":3,"text":"Luna Ruan "},{"url":"#marco-salazar","depth":3,"text":"Marco Salazar "},{"url":"#rachel-nabors","depth":3,"text":"Rachel Nabors "},{"url":"#rick-hanlon","depth":3,"text":"Rick Hanlon "},{"url":"#sebastian-markbåge","depth":3,"text":"Sebastian Markbåge "},{"url":"#seth-webster","depth":3,"text":"Seth Webster "},{"url":"#xuan-huang","depth":3,"text":"Xuan Huang "},{"url":"#past-contributors","depth":2,"text":"历史贡献者 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"React 的开发工作由 Facebook 专门工作小组全职领导。它也接受来自世界各地开发者们的贡献。"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react-core","children":"React 核心团队 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React 团队成员全职专注于从事核心组件 API、React DOM 和 React Native 的引擎、React DevTools 以及 React 文档等工作。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"目前 React 团队成员如下（按字母排序）。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"andrew-clark","children":"Andrew Clark "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/acdlite.jpg","alt":"Andrew Clark"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@acdlite on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@acdlite on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Andrew 通过 WordPress 制作网站开始接触 Web 开发，最终走上了 JavaScript 这条不归路。他最喜欢的业余活动是去 KTV 唱歌。Andrew 时而是迪士尼恶棍，时而是迪士尼公主，这取决于他当天的状态。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"brian-vaughn","children":"Brian Vaughn "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/bvaughn.jpg","alt":"Brian Vaughn"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/bvaughn","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@bvaughn on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/brian_d_vaughn","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@brian_d_vaughn on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Brian 在大学中主修艺术，为了支付学费而兼职学习了编程。后来，他意识到自己更喜欢从事开源方面的工作。Brian 有一个 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://soundcloud.com/brianvaughn/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"单人乐队"}]," 和两个 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://soundcloud.com/pilotlessdrone","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"双人"}]," ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://soundcloud.com/pinwurm","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"乐队"}],"。同时，他还拥有一只可爱的猫咪。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"dan-abramov","children":"Dan Abramov "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/gaearon.jpg","alt":"Dan Abramov"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/gaearon","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@gaearon on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/dan_abramov","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@dan_abramov on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Dan 是不经意间，发现微软 PowerPoint 中的 Visual Basic 后开始接触编程。他通过将 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"#sebastian-markbage","children":"Sebastian"}]," 的推文转为长篇博文后，找到了自己真正的使命。Dan 偶尔会沉浸于《堡垒之夜》胜利的喜悦当中。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"luna-ruan","children":"Luna Ruan "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/lunaruan.jpg","alt":"Luna"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/lunaruan","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@lunaruan on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/lunaruan","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@lunaruan on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Luna 学习编程是因为她觉得通过编程可以创造电子游戏。然而，她最终就职于 Pinterest 担任 Web 开发，现在又投身于 React 本身的开发当中。Luna 不再向往做电子游戏，但如果她感到无聊时，她会计划做创意写作。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"marco-salazar","children":"Marco Salazar "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/salazarm.jpeg","alt":"Marco"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/salazarm","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@salazarm on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/BkOptimism","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@BkOptimism on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Marco 的第一门编程语言是汇编，因为他可以通过汇编来侵入电子游戏。如今，网络游戏愈发安全，所以他退而求其次的选择公平竞技（大部分情况下）。闲暇时，他会在跑步机上玩游戏，并制作一些他从未完成的艺术品。希望他的 PR 不会有相同的命运。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rachel-nabors","children":"Rachel Nabors "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/rnabors.jpg","alt":"Rachel"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/rachelnabors","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@rachelnabors on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rachelnabors","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@rachelnabors on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Rachel 曾经编写过一本 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://abookapart.com/products/animation-at-work","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"关于 UI 动画的书"}],"，并与 MDN 和 W3C 合作开发了 Web 动画 API。现在她整忙于 React 团队的教程和社区工程。暗地里，她是一个获奖的少女漫画家。在公司厨房里，曾看到过她泡花茶。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rick-hanlon","children":"Rick Hanlon "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/rickhanlonii.jpg","alt":"Ricky"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@rickhanlonii on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@rickhanlonii on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Ricky 主修理论数学，在加入 React 团队前，他在 React Native 团队呆了几年。当他不编程时，你可以找他一起玩滑雪板、骑山地车、爬山、打高尔夫，或者关闭那些与 issue 模板不一致的 Github issue。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"sebastian-markbåge","children":"Sebastian Markbåge "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/sebmarkbage.jpg","alt":"Sebastian"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/sebmarkbage","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@sebmarkbage on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sebmarkbage","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@sebmarkbage on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Sebastian majored in psychology. He’s usually quiet. Even when he says something, it often doesn’t make sense to the rest of us until a few months later. The correct way to pronounce his surname is “mark-boa-geh” but he settled for “mark-beige” out of pragmatism — and that’s how he approaches React."}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"seth-webster","children":"Seth Webster "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/sethwebster.jpg","alt":"Seth"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@sethwebster on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@sethwebster on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Seth 从小就学习编程，在亚利桑那州图森市长大。放学后，他沉浸在音乐的殿堂里，在回归工作岗位前，他做了大约 10 年的巡回音乐人，后来就职于 Intuit。在业余时，他喜欢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.sethwebster.com","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"摄影"}]," 还会参与美国东北部的动物救援机构。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"xuan-huang","children":"Xuan Huang "}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"../images/team/huxpro.jpg","alt":"Xuan"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/huxpro","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@huxpro on GitHub"}]," · ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/huxpro","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@huxpro on Twitter"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Xuan 小时候接触过编程，用 Flash 制作游戏。他在大学里从事数字媒体艺术，但最终制作编译器吸引住了——正好 React 需要一个。工作之余，喜欢拿铁艺术，热爱网球和乒乓球。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"past-contributors","children":"历史贡献者 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["你可以在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/community/acknowledgements","children":"acknowledgements"}]," 页面中找到团队的历史成员和其他多年来为 React 做出过重大贡献的人。"]}]]}]]
